**Wildfire Satellite - Definition and Implementation Phases Preparatory Work**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Call Number**: WS3773679086-Doc3773732328

**Amendment Number**: 2

**Tender Notice**

**Issue Date**: December 13, 2022

**Closing Date**: January 23, 2023, at 14:00 EST

**Background**

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Space Agency (CSA), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation for the Definition and Implementation Phases Preparatory Work (Stage 1) for the Wildfire Satellite Mission (WFS).

**Scope**

The contractor shall provide services to support the definition and implementation phases of the Wildfire Satellite Mission, including the development of the mission concept, feasibility studies, and preliminary design.

**Contractual Requirements**

The contract duration is up to 6 months. The contractor must comply with the security requirements specified in the RFP document. The requirement is limited to Canadian goods and Canadian services.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The evaluation criteria for this RFP include technical merit, experience, and price.

**Important Information**

Please note that the closing time for this RFP has been amended to January 23, 2023, at 14:00 EST. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by this date and time. Bids received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Documents**

The complete RFP document, including all specifications and requirements, can be accessed via the ARIBA link: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14886477.
